title: Phasesabers
summaries: A Phasesaber is a Hardmode / pre-Hardmode broadsword which is a direct upgrade to the pre-Hardmode Phaseblade. It is very similar to its predecessor, except dealing about twice as much damage, being capable of autoswing, and having slightly modified visuals. As with Phaseblades, there are seven / six different color variations with identical statistics, with the color determined by the color of the Phaseblade used to craft it. All Phasesabers emit a small amount of light when swung.

Because Arch Demons drop Crystal Shards on the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version and only a pre-Hardmode Anvil is required for crafting it, the Phasesaber is available pre-Hardmode on this version.

statistics.Damage: 48 / 41 (Melee)
statistics.Use time: 16 (Very fast) / 25 (Fast)
statistics.Sell: 1
